Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Provides voice communication service to incarcerated people at no cost
Summary: Relates to providing voice communication services to incarcerated individuals in state correctional facilities at no cost; requires agencies charged with the operation and management of state and local correctional facilities and juvenile detention facilities to provide persons in their custody with voice communication service at a minimum of 90 minutes per day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to providing voice communication services to incarcerated individuals at no cost
